=========================================================================================
   How to Install AJAX Uploader Basic Examples
=========================================================================================

For .NET framework C# projects, use instructions at aspnet/net_cs/installation.htm
For .NET framework VB projects, use instructions at aspnet/net_vb/installation.htm

For ASP.NET AJAX C# projects, use instructions at aspnet/net_cs_aspnetAjax/installation.htm
For ASP.NET AJAX VB projects, use instructions at aspnet/net_vb_aspnetAjax/installation.htm

=========================================================================================
   How to Install AJAX Uploader Advanced Examples (Require SQL Server)
=========================================================================================

For .NET framework C# projects, use instructions at aspnet/advanced_cs/installation.htm
For .NET framework VB projects, use instructions at aspnet/advanced_vb/installation.htm

For ASP.NET AJAX C# projects, use instructions at aspnet/advanced_cs_aspnetAjax/installation.htm
For ASP.NET AJAX VB projects, use instructions at aspnet/advanced_vb_aspnetAjax/installation.htm

=========================================================================================
   How to Install ASP.NET MVC 2,3,4
=========================================================================================

For ASP.NET MVC 2.0 C# projects, use instructions at mvc/mvc2_cs/installation.htm
For ASP.NET MVC 2.0 VB projects, use instructions at mvc/mvc2_vb/installation.htm

For ASP.NET MVC 3.0 C# projects, use instructions at mvc/mvc3_cs/installation.htm
For ASP.NET MVC 3.0 C# projects, use instructions at mvc/mvc3_vb/installation.htm

For ASP.NET MVC 4.0 C# projects, use instructions at mvc/mvc4_cs/installation.htm
For ASP.NET MVC 4.0 C# projects, use instructions at mvc/mvc5_vb/installation.htm

=========================================================================================
   How to Install HTML5 (drag and drop, image crop, camera...)
=========================================================================================

For HTML5 projects, use instructions at html5/installation.htm

=========================================================================================
   How to Control the upload speed to test the progress bar
=========================================================================================

Add the following entry into your Web.config file. 
 
Example:  
<add key="CuteWebUI.AjaxUploader.UploadSpeedKB" value="100" />
